Hey there, uh I'm just...$2"/pause 350/faceDirection FC.Alan 1/pause 350/faceDirection FC.Alan 2/pause 300/speak FC.Alan "I know it probably looks like I'm talking to myself, but I promise you I'm not."/pause 1000/question fork1 "There are forest spirit's here, I can see them I swear...#I see them too.#Are you sure about that?"/fork FC.EmbarrassAlan/jump FC.Alan 5/pause 350/speak FC.Alan "Wait, really you can see them?$1"/pause 350/faceDirection FC.Alan 1/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 400/playSound junimoMeep1/speak FC.Alan "I'll introduce you all then!$1#$b#@, this is Mellie and Twinkle.#$b#They came with news, but I don't know if I can trust them.$2#$b#They're always tricking and pranking me.$1#$b#Like switching my potion ingrediants or that time they switch my shampoo with dye!$5#$b#I had pink hair for months!$1"/pause 1000/emote FC.Mellie 28/pause 350/speak FC.Mellie "We really speak the truth this time, something bad is happening in the mines.$3"/pause 400/advancedMove FC.Boxy false 0 -1 1 10 4 0 1 10 0 3 1 10 14 0 2 10/quickQuestion #I believe them.#Maybe if you both had proof?(break)speak FC.Twinkle "Alan friend, you can trust us this time!$1"\friendship FC.Alan 3(break)speak FC.Mellie "You humans are difficult!$3#$b#This is not a prank!$2"\friendship FC.Alan 3/pause 400/playSound junimoMeep1/speak FC.Twinkle "We are honest! Just look at Mellie's face! Don't you see, he's been hurt.$2"/pause 500/textAbovehead FC.Alan "Huh!"/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 450/speak FC.Alan "I can't believe I didn't notice that big cut!$2"/pause 350/move FC.Alan 0 -1 1/move FC.Alan 1 0 1/showFrame FC.Alan 36/pause 300/speak FC.Alan "Here, let me heal you.$2#$b#This is so odd though, I didn't know Jumino's could get hurt...$2"/pause 250/speak FC.Mellie "By other spirit's of the valley...If they are angry enough.$5"/pause 200/pause 1000/playSound healSound/pause 250/move FC.Alan -1 0 1/textAbovehead FC.Alan "There."/pause 350/speak FC.Alan "It's healed but...Left a pretty bad scar...$2"/pause 350/speak FC.Mellie "...$5#$b#Just tell someone who can help, before the restless breach the surface...$7"/pause 350/playSound junimoMeep1/jump FC.Twinkle 5/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 250/playSound junimoMeep1/faceDirection FC.Alan 2/speak FC.Alan "I better go tell Marlon, he should know what to do...$5"/faceDirection FC.Zuuie 2/emote FC.Zuuie 40/friendship FC.Alan 10/pause 200/viewport move 1 -1 6000000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Don't you see, he's been hurt.$3"/pause 500/textAbovehead FC.Alan "Huh!"/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection FC.Alan 1/pause 450/jump FC.Alan 5/speak FC.Alan "Why didn't I notice that big cut!$2"/pause 350/move FC.Alan 0 -1 1/move FC.Alan 1 0 1/showFrame FC.Alan 36/pause 300/speak FC.Alan "Here, let me heal you.$2#$b#This is so odd though, I didn't know Jumino's could get hurt...$2"/pause 250/speak FC.Mellie "By other spirit's of the valley...If they are angry enough.$5"/pause 200/pause 1000/playSound healSound/pause 250/move FC.Alan -1 0 1/textAbovehead FC.Alan "There."/pause 350/speak FC.Alan "It's healed but...Left a pretty bad scar...$2"/pause 350/speak FC.Mellie "...$5#$b#Just tell someone who can help, before the restless breach the surface...$7"/pause 350/playSound junimoMeep1/jump FC.Twinkle 5/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 250/playSound junimoMeep1/faceDirection FC.Alan 2/speak FC.Alan "I better go tell Marlon, he should know what to do...$5"/faceDirection FC.Zuuie 2/emote FC.Zuuie 40/friendship FC.Alan -10/pause 200/viewport move 1 -1 6000000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
